document.full_text: selig said that though scheduling was a major issue of discussion, 'the more we've talked about it, i think we're moving inexorably,' to the expansion.
document.title: baseball roundup: selig expects playoffs to expand in 2012
lines_and_colors: selig said that though scheduling was a major issue of discussion, 'the more we've talked about it, i think we're moving inexorably,' to the expansion.
